  nb_compo=lire_dimension(is,que_suis_je());

    {
      Cerr << "Error in Champ_Fonc_t::readOn : nb_compo <= 0" << finl;

      is >> expression;
      const char* s = expression.getChar();

      ft[i_parser].setString(ss);
      ft[i_parser].addVar("t");
      ft[i_parser].parseString();
